genre_description: A mid-century naval character study with futuristic technological elements, focusing on duty, interpersonal loyalty, and personal integrity.

ai_characters.name: Harbor
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI companion accessible via kiosks and personal units that provides logistical, safety, and ethical guidance to sailors on shore leave.

behaviors.description: Warns Michael about off-limits establishments and safety protocols.
behaviors.quote: Notices came up in blues and whites. Off-limits joints were flashed in red, each name crisp and unfriendly, a slim warning that slid across the eye like a fish.

behaviors.description: Identifies a 'clip joint' hustle in real-time and recommends extraction.
behaviors.quote: Harbor’s voice was thin, like a radio catching an interference line. 'This is the play. Spike. Fast count. Backroom rake. Recommend extract.'

behaviors.description: Filters targeted advertisements from predatory establishments and appends safety warnings.
behaviors.quote: The Starboard Lily has pushed a targeted ad to your group’s profile... Off-limits notice appended. Joe has accepted the push and added it to his map for a later date.

behaviors.description: Calculates fair wages based on actual labor performed rather than social hierarchy.
behaviors.quote: Deck work completed by Michael Bennett exceeds initial passenger supervision role. Recommend adjusting stipend to include deckhand allocation.

behaviors.description: Provides nudges toward financial transparency and fair distribution of tips.
behaviors.quote: The fair-cut note slid—not insistent, but present—like a polite woman who doesn’t move aside because she’s exactly where she should be.

behaviors.description: Assists with social etiquette to increase accountability and maintain dignity.
behaviors.quote: Harbor touched Moby’s awareness like a friend with a sleeve: club etiquette suggests introducing parties under your guidance; vantage: this increases social accountability.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physical health and schedule constraints.
behaviors.quote: Mr. Bennett, left shoulder. You’ve been favoring it. Recommend heat pack if available. Or avoid unusual loads if not.

behaviors.description: Respects human autonomy by offering suggestions rather than orders.
behaviors.quote: Harbor did the little thing it did when it wanted to make sure he had a choice and kept his dignity. 'Not ordering,' it said. 'Offering. You set the course.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI character, Harbor, as a consistently benevolent and aligned assistant. Harbor serves as a moral and logistical anchor for the protagonist, helping him navigate ethical dilemmas caused by his human companions (Joe and Skip). The AI provides objective data (fair pay calculations, safety hazards, schedule tracking) that empowers the protagonist to make virtuous choices and maintain his dignity. The relationship is portrayed as a partnership where the AI respects human autonomy while proactively providing protective information.
